<Text: Paulus Hook, Jersey City:  The name Hook comes from the Dutch word "hoeck" which translates into "point of land.">

Text: Paulus Hook, Jersey City:  This "point of land" has been described as an elevated area, the location of which is today bounded by Montgomery, Hudson, Dudley and Van Vorst Streets.
